hopobject.name: BeagleBrick
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.9.1.6) Gecko/20091201 Firefox/3.5.6
hopobject.body: Completely self-contained SDR Ham Radio Station featuring the Beagleboard in conjunction with an array to inexpensive QRP transceiver kits. To date several popular DSP and Software Defined Radio programs such as FLDigi and Hamlib have been ported to Angstrom Linux for use on the BeagleBoard. Rob's BBImage containing all the software as well as instructions for loading onto an SD card for the Beagleboard is available for free download at:: http://www.rarcpio.net/beaglebrick/downloads/
hopobject.shortdesc: SDR Ham Radio + BeagleBoard - Why Bark When You Can Byte?
